resources.string: This is a Proof of concept. Testing proximity based reminders using bluetooth technology. Currently it is built for bluetooth 3.0. Bluetooth 4.0(LE) is not implemented yet due to lack of testing. Please try it out and give feedback below.
Known bugs \n Does not work with IOS devices(May be fixed with bt LE)

How To\nCreate a reminder by clicking on a device or a contact, when a reminder is created a contact is as well. Once you close the app it will scan every ten minutes. Once it finds a device it will alert you by notification. Click on a reminder to delete it.
